attributes.action: Use Oliver Cromwells disolutiion of Parliament Act 1653 to dissolve Parliament
attributes.additional_details: It is time to dissolve Parliament as they are now the monarchy of old ignoring and persecuting the democratic processes, they need to be removed and Parliament dissolved using Oliver Cromwells dissolution of Parliament Act 1653
attributes.background: Parliament has failed democracy and the people of the UK who the Politicians are appointed to serve

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because all legislation passed during the Protectorate was annulled at the Restoration. Parliament would need to pass new legislation.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like Parliament replaced with if that is something you would like to see happen.
